channel.title: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?
channel.description:
Has anyone ever tried it like im doing it and im wondering if anyone else is doing it. this is the on im doing http://www.awsurveys.com and it offers a few things that i like.
[ul][li]Offers $1.25 Per Friend that registers for free.[/li] [li]You get paid $6.00 on your welcome survey[/li] [li]you get paid from $1 to $25 per survey/panel group[/li] [li]Monthly bonus surveys[/li][/ul]
I just want to know what you guys think about it, just your general impression. Or if you people have a better suggestion for site like this.

item.title: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.source: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?

item.title: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

You hid a referral in that link. Clearly you did not post this to start discussion, or to benefit us. You did it purely for your own gain.

Read the rules before you post next time.

Read full topic
item.source: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?

item.title: Get Paid to take surveys? Real or Fake?
item.dc:creator: @Cruzer Cruzer
item.description:
@Cruzer wrote:

Hidden referral, PLUS everyone know they are scams.

Read full topic
